issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement SQL join support using explicit JOIN ON syntax
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10584](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10584). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update the SQL to DataFrame / LogicalPlan logic to support inner equijoin. Suitable error should be returned for any unsupported join.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10584?focusedCommentId=17239724) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8751
